en.question: Why did I choose to make an online résumé?
en.answer: I wanted to show a glimpse of what I can do, I think a website is more relevant than a piece of paper to show my work. By the way, the code is on [Github](http://github.com/rempartIrien/resume).

en.question: What did I use to make this website?
en.answer: I used Vue.js, Pug and Stylus as technologies and Visual Studio Code as text editor.

en.question: What is my favorite sport?
en.answer: I like football (soccer) and tennis, I find them aesthetic.

en.question: What artist have I most seen so far?
In which Hogwarts House should the Sorting Hat send me?
